artist: Allan D'Arcangelo; Publisher: M. Magidson & Assoc.. Inc., San Francisco; Printer: Printed and fabricated by Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
image_copyright: © Estate Allan D'Arcangelo / Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society (ARS), NY
inscription: Engraved inscription on steel plate (verso): PRODUCED AT VERMILLION ED. LTD. / PUBLISHED BY M. MAGIDSON & ASSOC. INC. / COPYRIGHT ALLAN D'ARCANGELO 1978
medium: Color lithograph background with side panels die cut on Arches paper, collaged with wire, aircraft cable, turnbuckles, wire rope clips, wire connectors, and hand-painted wood insulators, enclosed in a painted pine and mahogany box with Plexiglas
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
title: The Bead Game
